project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a quiz game in Python that will ask multiple-choice questions, track user scores, and display the final score at the end.

task.name: Create a list of questions and answers
Implement the game logic that asks questions to the user
Display the final score at the end of the game
Write tests for each game feature (questions, scoring, etc.)
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
